edu.nd.darts.cimon
Class CpuService

java.lang.Object
  edu.nd.darts.cimon.MetricService<Float>
      edu.nd.darts.cimon.CpuService
All Implemented Interfaces:
ObservableUpdate
public final class CpuService
extends MetricService<Float>

Monitoring service for CPU loads. CPU load metrics:

  • Load (1 minute) - average CPU load over past minute
  • Load (5 minute) - average CPU load over past five minutes
  • Load (15 minute) - average CPU load over past fifteen minutes

    Author:
    darts
    See Also:
    MetricService

    getMetricValue

    Float getMetricValue(int metric)
    Description copied from class: MetricService
    Obtain current value of metric, or null if not currently available. Subclasses may override this to provide custom response, including fetching fresh values before returning.

    Overrides:
    getMetricValue in class MetricService<Float>
    Parameters:
    metric - integer representing metric (per Metrics) to acquire
    Returns:
    current value of metric, or null if not available
